channel.title: Will's blog
channel.description: Here's my blog! It's made with Pupate, a static-site-generator I built. You can read some of my things that I've written. Go on!

item.title: bold, ital, and lots of colors in the title!
CSS test
item.description: This is a test of css soup-making recipe. First, do something. testing css variables and more!

item.title: How I make soup
item.description: This is a post with my meta-soup-making recipe. First, do something. Make sure you eat the soup, don't drink it.
